name: Sneakerwear
description: sneakerwear is a platform created by Brainhackers for consumers to purchase sneakers. Used Angular, Node.Js, Express.Js, PostgreSQL, and Boostrap

name: HRManagementSystem
description: An App responsible for Human Resource or Administrators keep track of employees number in the company or add newly appointed employees to their system. Used Angular, Node.Js, Express.Js, PostgreSQL, DaisyUi, and PrimeNG

name: Movie Database
description: An app that helps users search for newly released movies and series, and it allows them to create their watch list. Used Angular, Nest.Js, MongoDB, DaisyUi, and PrimeNG

name: Authenticate app
description: an authentication app for registering new user and login using jwt sign, you are able to update your password through forgot password. Used Node.Js, Express.Js, PostgreSQL

name: Bookstore Management
description: Used Django, Django Rest Framework, Angular, PostgreSQL, and Boostrap
